title: What Basic Rune Page setups should I have?
body: I hardly bought any runes because of their price and I generally always win my lane and blah blah. But is there a very general rune page setup I can get for Ad and Ap? I want to get some but not a bunch  of specific ones

replies.body:
Flat armor seals, flat magic resistance glyphs.

Magic penetration marks for Ap champs, and AP quintessences.

Attack damage marks and quints for AD champs.

Later when you are going for more variety you can do scaling health seals for tanks and attack speed marks and quints for marksmen that scale well with it.

There are a lot of things you can do with your runes, but those are the most popular.
Most of what i see is armor yellows and mr blues with offensive reds and quints.
